properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 4:50AM AKST until February 18 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibility
of one half mile or less.

* WHERE...Pribilof Islands.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 5 AM AKST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North to northwesterly winds will increase
this afternoon, causing blowing snow conditions for the Pribilof
Islands. Winds will weaken Tuesday morning as the associated low
moves eastward.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM AKST TUESDAY
